physical_examinations.relevant_findings: The patient is a 43-year-old woman who underwent DIEP flap breast reconstruction after modified left radical mastectomy and radiation therapy. Postoperative day 15 assessment revealed ischemia in the reconstructed flap.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The flap showed initial viability but deteriorated to partial necrosis of the central and medial areas over a 15-day period.
